entry.title: WIND WARNING , Lincoln
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:41 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 16.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vineland Station 3:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 51 %
Dewpoint: 6.2°C
Wind: WSW 50 km/h gust 78 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 100 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 then becoming west 20 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain changing to light snow after midnight. Risk of freezing rain in the evening and after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
